item.title: Hey i was wondering if anyone can convert this for me? 317 would really help me
item.dc:creator: @pk_hell1 pk_hell
item.description:
@pk_hell1 wrote:

i have these but there not converted i need help as soon as possible i need admin cape mod cape and owner cape for 317

[center]Hello i was wondering if anyone could convert this

if(i == 13672) // change this if you need to "item number" { } if(i == 13677) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14125; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14126; //Male class8.anInt200 = 14126; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Moderator cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A moderator Cape".getBytes(); } if(i == 13678) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14127; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14128; //Male class8.anInt200 = 14128; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Administrator cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its an administrator cape".getBytes(); } if(i == 13679) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14129; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14130; //Male class8.anInt200 = 14130; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Owner cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its an owner cape".getBytes(); }

To this

case ####: itemDef.name itemDef.description itemDef.actions = itemDef.groundActions itemDef.modelID itemDef.maleEquip1 itemDef.femaleEquip1 itemDef.modelZoom itemDef.modelRotation1 itemDef.modelRotation2 itemDef.modelOffset1 itemDef.modelOffset2 break;[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Hey i was wondering if anyone can convert this for me? 317 would really help me
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I didn’t try that hard…

case 13672:// if(i == 13672) // change this if you need to "item number" // { // } break; case 13677:// if(i == 13677) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[1] = "Take"; itemDef.modelID = 14125; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 14126; //Male itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 14126; //Female itemDef.name = "Moderator cape"; itemDef.description = "Its A moderator Cape".getBytes(); break;// } case 13678:// if(i == 13678) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[1] = "Take"; itemDef.modelID = 14127; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 14128; //Male itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 14128; //Female itemDef.name = "Administrator cape"; itemDef.description = "Its an administrator cape".getBytes(); break;// } case 13679:// if(i == 13679) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[1] = "Take"; itemDef.modelID = 14129; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 14130; //Male itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 14130; //Female itemDef.name = "Owner cape"; itemDef.description = "Its an owner cape"; break;// }
